titles.title: For the relief of Kadiatou Diallo, Sankerala Diallo, Ibrahima Diallo, Abdoul Diallo, Mamadou Pathe Diallo, and Fatoumata Traore Diallo.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Border Security.

bill.summary: 11/21/2013--Introduced. Provides for the relief of Kadiatou Diallo, Sankerala Diallo, Ibrahima Diallo, Abdoul Diallo, and Mamadou Pathe Diallo and Fatoumata Traore Diallo.
